meanings.definition: A sweet, gelatinous dessert made with flavored and colored gelatin.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat jello for dessert.
meanings.sent2: The kids enjoyed a bowl of jello after dinner.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the jello wiggled and jiggled on the table.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as wobbly and sweet as a bowl of jello.
meanings.sent5: The colorful jello shimmered under the lights, tempting everyone to take a bite.

meanings.definition: To congeal or set into a gelatinous form.
meanings.sent1: The mixture will jello in the fridge overnight.
meanings.sent2: The liquid began to jello as it cooled down.
meanings.sent3: The plan started to jello in his mind as he thought it through.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship seemed to jello into a strong bond over time.
meanings.sent5: The idea began to jello into a solid plan after hours of discussion.
